name: devtrackr
description: Track your coding journey effortlessly with DevTrackr. Automatically create a detailed timeline of your development activity, complete with GitHub integration. This extension logs your progress, generates concise summaries of your work every 30 minutes, and commits them to a Git repository of your choice. Perfect for developers who want a meticulous record of their productivity and insights into their workflow. Whether you're working on personal projects, contributing to open source, or managing tasks at work, DevTrackr ensures you never lose track of your progress.

devtrackr.githubToken.description: Personal Access Token for GitHub API.

devtrackr.repoName.description: Name of the GitHub repository to store tracking logs.

devtrackr.exclude.description: List of glob patterns to exclude from tracking.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
